name: Formation
0:
”Alexa, play Jazz in the bedroom”
”Alexa, volume 15 on the balcony”
”Alexa, pause the porch”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Bowers & Wilkins Formation Home app provides a convenient way to wirelessly stream music and control your Formation speakers. Now you can use your Alexa-enabled speakers and the Alexa app to play music and remote control your speakers through the power of voice.

Helpful Information
Ask Alexa to rediscover your devices whenever you add, rename, or delete a Formation speaker in your home. 
Ask Alexa to initiate music to one Formation speaker, and you will need to use the Bowers & Wilkins Home app to share the music to multiple speakers. You can also press the Form button on the speaker you would like music to be shared to. 
 
FAQs
For troubleshooting tips and suggestions, visit https://bowersandwilkinspkblivesite.secure.force.com/support/BW_ArticleDetails?category=Formation&kaid=kA02M0000010zl7SAA&lang=en_US or contact Customer Support at https://bowersandwilkinspkblivesite.secure.force.com/support/BWContactUs?category=Formation&lang=en_US 
 
Supported Devices 
The Formation Skill works with all Formation-branded products controlled by the Bowers & Wilkins Home app: 
- Formation Audio 
- Formation Bar 
- Formation Duo 
- Formation Flex 
- Formation Wedge 
 
Supported Music Services
http://www.bowerswilkins.com/support/formation/alexa#musicservices
